name: Watercress and Red Onion Salad
keywords: dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, red onion, watercress
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Cut off and discard the tough stems of the watercress. Rinse and spin dry.
Place the vinegar in a salad bowl and add salt and pepper. Beat with a wire whisk while adding the oil. Add the watercress, onion rings and parsley and toss well to blend. Serve.
